title: LCU Crashing immediately after login
body: This has been occurring since the 7.1 Patch, using the LCU, after I log in, the login screen music cuts out a few times, the client starts to load, and then will suddenly close.  There is no error.   The LCU client works on PBE, and I have no problems with the legacy client.  I have already reinstalled league completely once.  Any insight on to fixes I could try would be appreciated.

replies.body:
It sounds a lot like your client is dropping its connection to our game platform, which causes the sudden, error-less crash. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

I've tried everything on this list that I can do with confidence, but I'm not too savvy on how all of this works, and I've had no luck so far.
I did run Netalyzr, but I don't understand everything that it describes: **[Link Removed]**
Thanks for your help!

Ooh, that Netalyzr actually includes some sensitive data you may not want to make public, so I had to remove the link. =/

There wasn't a ton of data in that log, so since you're having further issues, I recommend we escalate this to our tech team. I'd like you to run some system logs using our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you run into issues, lmk.
